media/user/SCRAPE/test/2017-11-life-drag/extracted/Life Drag  - Feed Your Grave (white)/03 A Living Trend
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2017-11-life-drag/extracted/Life Drag  - Feed Your Grave (white)/05 Backyard Hole
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2017-11-life-drag/extracted/Life Drag  - Feed Your Grave (white)/06 Collapse Of Reality
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2017-11-life-drag/extracted/Life Drag  - Feed Your Grave (white)/07 Back Door

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 09, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
More anguished submissions from LIFE DRAG. 2016's Feel Your Grave was perhaps slightly more coherent than 2016's Feed Your Grave (that's not a typo), but this offering opts for desolation and darkness and misery brooding beneath a shroud of hollow sound. Well....I guess that's pretty much the same as the other one, but my point is that the vision feels more realized on this cassette. Listen to the dirge that is "Collapse Of Reality." Listen to the brutal monotony of "Transaction." Listen to the sparse desperation of "A Living Trend." Listen to your pain. Feel Your Grave once again.   FEED YOUR GRAVE
http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2017/01/life-drag.html http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2017/01/life-drag.html
